description:
**Tool Overview**:

This tool is intended to address the Windows Group Policy elevation of privilege vulnerability identified by CVE-2024-20657. The detailed explanation for this Tool is provided in the Fix description.

***Details***:

The tool is designed to provide system administrators a way to mitigate the impact of this specific vulnerability, allowing them to ensure that only authorized users have sufficient privileges to modify group policy settings. Through this tool, administrators can audit and restrict access, thereby minimizing potential exploitation paths. This tool may utilize a PowerShell script or a Group Policy Object (GPO) setting to manage permissions associated with group policies. Further implementation details, including commands and parameters, are found in the accompanying documentation in the Fix description.
